chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = BinNums.positive : Set
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty t
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l
ad = BinNums.N : Set
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e...
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e :...
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
sem_equiv_prop_l = fun l : term_list => forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p l n = true -> liste_reconnait d p l : term_list -> Prop
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl)
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
rec_consn : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
term_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term -> Prop, (forall t : term, P t t) -> (forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t (app a tl)) -> forall t t0 : term, term_occur t t0 -> P t t0
conservation_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence_list tl d la) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
indprinciple_3_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : term -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, term_high t <= n -> P t
conservation_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence_list (tcons hd tl) d ls) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
rec_list_terms = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true...
term_list_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t tl -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), term_list_occur t t0 -> P t t0
term_rect : forall P : term -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_rec : forall P : term -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
